name: Flaming Go
description:
Play as a flamingo who's had enough of these damn giant mosquitos. Z to jump and X to dash and arrow keys to move around and control dash direction. There are two game modes to choose from: arena, where you fight an endless horde of mosquitoes; and the tower, where you must reach the top. By the way, you will see an enticing looking chest whenever you complete at least 5-hit combos. These were supposed to provide upgrades which I haven't gotten around to implement and probably never will.

This is the first game of my series of small prototype-like games. It was done in less than two weeks. A very simple concept meant to learn how to use GameMaker, the engine I chose for this series of small games. Next games will hopefully be more interesting as I feel more comfortable with the engine.
